xal.extension.application.smf

Class AcceleratorApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.application.Application
      • xal.extension.application.FrameApplication
        • xal.extension.application.smf.AcceleratorApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XalDocumentListener

    public class AcceleratorApplication
extends FrameApplication
    AcceleratorApplication is the subclass of Application that is required for accelerator based applications.
